speaker: Viral image
vclaim: A Time magazine cover calls Donald Trump the “Worst. President. Ever.”
date: stated on September 18, 2020 in a Facebook post:
title: A fake Donald Trump Time cover spreads on social media
text:
President Donald Trump has appeared on the cover of Time dozens of times, but a photo of him under the words "Worst. President. Ever" is not among them.
A post with an image of this cover was flagged as part of Facebook’s efforts to combat false news and misinformation on its News Feed. (Read more about our partnership with Facebook.) 
The fake cover story being shared on social media shows a doctored image of Trump with part of his face appearing as a skeleton. "How Donald Trump has disgraced the highest office in the nation," it says, along with the words "divider," "liar," "rapist," "thief," "usurper," "manipulator," "collaborator" and "traitor." 

Featured Fact-check
















Bloggers


stated on January 10, 2021 in a story








"Trump signs Insurrection Act - General Flynn to be appointed vice president."












By Samantha Putterman • January 11, 2021







Kristin Matzen, a spokesperson for Time, told us that the image in the Facebook post is not an authentic Time cover. 
We rate this post Pants on Fire.
